Translations.Text: ae iman walo! un kuffar se lado jo tumhare aas paas hai aur un ko tumhare andar saqti paana chahiye,aur ye yaqin rakho ke Allah tala muttaqi logo ke sath hai

aur jab koi surath nazil ki jati hai tuh baaz munafiqin kehte hai ke is surath ne tum mein se kis ke iman ko zyada kiya hai,so jo log iman wale hai us surath ne un ke iman ko zyada kiya hai aur wo khush ho rahe hai
aur jin ke dilo mein rog hai us surath ne un mein un ki gandagi ke sath aur gandagi bada di aur wo halath e kufr hee mein mar gae
aur kya un ko nahi dikhlai deta ke ye log har saal ek bar ya do bar kisi na kisi aafath mein phuste rehte hai,phir bhi na tauba karte hai,na nasihath qubol karte hai
aur jab koi surath nazil ki jati hai tuh ek dosre ko dekhne lagte hai ke tum ko koi dekhta tuh nahi,phir chal dete hai,Allah tala ne un ka dil pher diya hai is wajeh se ke wo besamajh log hai

tumhare paas ek aise paighambar tashrif lae hai jo tumhari jins se hai jin ko tumhari muzrrath21 ki bath nihayath gera guzarti hai jo tumhari manfath22 ke bade qwahish mandh rehte hai,imanwalo ke sath bade hee shafeeq aur meherban hai
phir agar rugardani kare tuh aap keh dijiye ke mere liye Allah kafi hai,us ke siva koi mabodh nahi,main ne osi par bharosa kiya aur wo bade arsh ka malik hai
